ordersActivatedToDate: SELECT count(*) FROM fbs_dell_order_t WHERE order_status=1
ordersPendingToDate: SELECT count(*) FROM fbs_dell_order_t WHERE order_status=2
ordersWErrorToDate: SELECT count(*) FROM fbs_dell_order_t WHERE order_status=3
ordersReceivedRange: SELECT count(*) FROM fbs_dell_order_t WHERE created_t>= :start AND created_t< :end
ordersActivatedRange: SELECT count(*) FROM fbs_dell_order_t WHERE order_status=2 AND created_t>=:start AND created_t< :end
ordersPendingRange: SELECT count(*) FROM fbs_dell_order_t WHERE order_status=3 AND created_t>=:start AND created_t<:end
subscriptionsCancelled: select count(*) from brm_prod.purchased_product_t pp, brm_prod.product_t p where status=3 and pp.product_obj_id0 = p.poid_id0 and p.name not in('One-time Initial Product')
subscriptionsOptOut: SELECT count(*) FROM brm_prod.purchased_product_t pp, brm_prod.product_t p where status=1 AND pp.cycle_end_t != 0 AND pp.product_obj_id0 = p.poid_id0 AND p.name NOT in('One-time Initial Product')
subscriptionsOptIn: select count(*) from brm_prod.purchased_product_t pp, brm_prod.product_t p where status=1 and pp.cycle_end_t = 0 and pp.product_obj_id0 = p.poid_id0 and p.name not in('One-time Initial Product')
tcSuccessResponse: select count(*) from brm_prod.dell_bill_tcc_t where compliance_status=1
tcHoldResponse: select count(*) from brm_prod.dell_bill_tcc_t where compliance_status=2
tcRejectedResponse: select count(*) from brm_prod.dell_bill_tcc_t where compliance_status=3
revenueBilledToDate: select sum(total_due) from brm_prod.bill_t where name='PIN Bill' and end_t!=0 and parent_id0=0
revenueCollectedToDate: select sum(recvd) from brm_prod.authorization_response_t a, brm_prod.bill_t b where a.ar_bill_obj_id0= b.poid_id0 and a.status_flag=0
revenueDeclinedToDate: select sum(total_due) from brm_prod.authorization_response_t a, brm_prod.bill_t b where a.ar_bill_obj_id0= b.poid_id0 and a.status_flag!=0 and a.status_flag!=17
revenueWithErrorToDate: select sum(total_due) from brm_prod.authorization_response_t a, brm_prod.bill_t b where a.ar_bill_obj_id0= b.poid_id0 and a.status_flag=17
revenueWithComFailureToDate: select count(*) from brm_prod.event_billing_charge_t where command=4 and result=999
renewalRequestTotal: select count(*) from brm_prod.authorization_response_t where status_flag=0 and provisioning_flag!=0 and provisioning_flag!=999
renewalResponsesReceived: select count(*) from brm_prod.authorization_response_t where status_flag=0 and provisioning_flag=4
